input_text:
Job Title: Machine Operator 1st Shift (A1734)

Location: Newbury, OH

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Our Client in Newbury, OH,provider of specialty packaging services for a wide range of industrial chemicals, has an immediate need for Machine Operators. #COH

Already Registered with Express Employment?No need to apply. Text A1734 to (440) 571-5185. The Pay is $19.00 per Hour7:00AM - 3:30PMThis job is in Newbury, OHMost Benefits Available Immediately (See Below)Never a Fee to the Applicant Five Ways to Apply: Apply here online.Call (440) 571-5185 to schedule an interview.Text us at (440) 571-5185.Stop into7959 Reynolds RoadM-F between 9 AM and 3:30 PM.Download the ExpressJobs app fromGoogle Playor theApple Store Purpose:

Operates all production equipment safely and efficiently to produce quality material that meets customer requirements.

General Policy: Operate all production equipment safely and efficiently to produce quality materials that meet the customer requirementsCompliance with Work Package instructions and reviews production specificationsCommunicate and review status of work in process at beginning and end of shiftPerform startups and shutdowns of equipment as neededReports decisions, problems, and questions in a timely manner to managementKeep a clean and safe work areaAssist in the completion of special projectsFollow all Quality, Safety and Environmental ProceduresUphold the company''s Code of Conduct StandardsOther duties as assigned by the Production Manager Minimum Qualifications, Education, Experience, Certifications: Education: High School Diploma or EquivalentExperience: Experience is a plus but not required, must be willing to learnBasic Math Skills: RequiredAbility to Read, Speak, and Write English efficiently, preferredAbility to communicate with others and managementLicenses / Certifications: Forklift certification, preferred Competencies, Knowledge, Skills, Abilities (KSA):

To perform this role successfully, an individual must have experience achieving desired results in their areas of responsibility. The requirements listed below are representative of observable behaviors and essential knowledge, skill, and abilities required of a successful incumbent within our culture: Must be comfortable working in a shared space, with constant noiseMust be comfortable working in a non-climate-controlled environmentSchedules may vary from week to week based on business demands in excess of 40 hours with or without notice Express Benefits Available: Health InsuranceDentalVisionLife InsuranceDisability401(k) (Requires Waiting Period)Paid HolidaysReferral Bonuses<span style="font-familyPandoLogic. Keywords: General Machine Operator, Location: Newbury, OH - 44065

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Machine Operator 1st Shift (A1734)
output_json.summary: Immediate need for Machine Operators at a specialty packaging services provider in Newbury, OH.
job_responsibilities: Operates all production equipment safely and efficiently to produce quality material that meets customer requirements.
Compliance with Work Package instructions and reviews production specifications.
Communicate and review status of work in process at beginning and end of shift.
Perform startups and shutdowns of equipment as needed.
Reports decisions, problems, and questions in a timely manner to management.
Keep a clean and safe work area.
Assist in the completion of special projects.
Follow all Quality, Safety and Environmental Procedures.
Uphold the company's Code of Conduct Standards.
Other duties as assigned by the Production Manager.
output_json.physical_requirements: Must be comfortable working in a shared space, with constant noise. Must be comfortable working in a non-climate-controlled environment. Schedules may vary from week to week based on business demands in excess of 40 hours with or without notice.
output_json.company_information: Client in Newbury, OH, provider of specialty packaging services for a wide range of industrial chemicals.
